Deschide navigarea Închide navigarea Câmp obligatoriu Data selectată: %s Nicio dată selectată //locatie About Us Our Location Brailei Street No. 10, Galati, Romania, Postal Code 123456 Get Directions Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) What medical services do you offer? We offer a wide range of medical services, including general consultations, specialties (cardiology, dermatology, pediatrics, etc.) and medical tests. How can I make an appointment? You can make an appointment directly from the app, by selecting the desired date and time, or you can contact us by phone. Do you accept medical insurance? We collaborate with various insurance companies. Please contact us to check your insurance compatibility. Contact Us +40712345678 contact@cabinetprivat.ro Call Us Email Us
